Contributor: David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: "Poster No. 80." "W.417. 35M-4/15" appears on the bottom right of poster. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Illustration shows a shadowed figure of a serviceman saluting. Text says come along boys you are wanted.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 80.

Title: Boys! come along
